description:
The public has started to turn against all NEXT. Ryan thinks that a NEXT named Gregory Sunshine might be connected to the "X" phenomenon.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Hitori no Mokugeki wa Juunin no Denbun ni Masaru
One Eyewitness Is Better Than Ten Hearsays.
One eyewitness is better than ten hearsays. 一人の目撃は十人の伝聞に勝る
